sentences.cn: 令人腻烦的语言或情感

sentences.en: Delicate little reservations were cloying him.
sentences.cn: 种种微妙难言的隐衷萦结在他的心头.

sentences.en: Her cheap, cloying scent enveloped him.
sentences.cn: 她那廉价香水甜腻熏人的气味一下子包围了他。

sentences.en: His particular trademark is a cute and cloying sentimentality.
sentences.cn: 他独特的标志是做作的、让人反感的多愁善感.

sentences.en: It is pointed out that the fluctuation - based way of problem - cloying is complicated and irreversible.
sentences.cn: 认为基于涨落原理的问题解决路径是复杂的和不可逆的网状结构.

sentences.en: Most TV kids are so cloying.
sentences.cn: 电视上的大部分童星都太让人腻烦。

sentences.en: the cloying sentimentality of her novels
sentences.cn: 她的小说中令人厌烦的感伤情调

sentences.en: These constructs soon become cloying and distracting.
sentences.cn: 这些东西很快就变得倒胃口,令人心神不宁.

words.tran_cn: 厌烦的；倒胃口的；因过量而厌烦的

trans.tran_cn: <正>（食物、气味等）甜得发腻的，使人腻烦的，（感情过于外露而） 令人腻烦的
<正>发腻，倒胃口( cloy的现在分词 )
